main event: Observers in Germantown, Ohio, reported sightings of a bright star-like object in the western sky on October 20, 1969.
interesting points: The object appeared very bright and was described as erratic in flight, Observers noted it left a white light trail, A sketch diagram was used to illustrate the object's elevation and trajectory, The sighting lasted approximately 5 minutes, No physical evidence or photographs were recorded.
witness description: Observers described the object as having a bluish white light and noted it was unlike any known aircraft.
